node.title: Daniel Ricciardo misses out on qualifying in the top 10 by tiniest of margins, late crash costs Max Verstappen pole position
node.alt: Race driver with is helmet on sitting in his open-wheel car.
node.description: Australian Formula One driver Daniel Ricciardo misses out on qualifying in the top 10 spots for this weekend's Saudi Arabia Grand Prix, by the tiniest of margins, while a late crash robs rival Max Verstappen of pole position.
node.content:
["Australian Formula One\u00a0driver\u00a0Daniel Ricciardo has missed out on qualifying in the top 10 spots for n this weekend's Saudi Arabia Grand Prix, by the tiniest\u00a0of margins, while a late crash robbed rival Max Verstappen of pole position.\u00a0", "Ricciardo was knocked out of the second qualifying session by just 50 milliseconds, finishing 11th.\u00a0", "His McLaren teammate, Lando Norris, fared better in the Saudi Arabian city of Jeddah, finishing seventh around the street circuit.\u00a0", "Ricciardo has struggled in recent times,\u00a0not scoring\u00a0a point in his last three races.", "The poor result\u00a0has all but ensured Ricciardo will not finish higher than eighth in the driver standings.", "Struggles for Norris have also allowed Ferrari to pass McLaren for third in the constructor's championships.\u00a0", "
Verstappen crashes late, throwing away pole position\u00a0
", "Meanwhile, championship leader Max Verstappen looked on course to snag pole position from rival Lewis Hamilton before crashing on his final flying lap.\u00a0", "As the top 10 drivers went for their final flying laps, Red Bull's Verstappen was on provisional pole.", "However, while both the Mercedes of Hamilton and Valterri Bottas were able to go faster than the championship leader, Verstappen clipped the barrier and ruined his chances of starting on the front row.\u00a0", "The Dutchman will start the race from third.\u00a0", "Verstappen goes into the Sunday's race with a narrow, eight-point lead over Hamilton in the driver standings and has an outside chance of securing the championship in Jeddah.\u00a0", "\"It's terrible.\u00a0We were having a good qualifying \u2026\u00a0I knew the pace was there,\" Verstappen said.\u00a0", "\"P3 is a bit disappointing today, knowing the lap I was on. Nevertheless,\u00a0it shows the car is quick.\"", "In his post-qualifying interview, Hamilton said the Red Bull cars looked \"rapid\" around the street circuit."]
